com.badlogic.gdx.utils
Class PauseableThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.badlogic.gdx.utils.PauseableThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class PauseableThread
extends java.lang.Thread

A pausable thread. The runnable must not execute an inifite loop but should return control to the thread as often as possible so that the thread can actually pause.

Author:
mzechner
